data.description: Parsed XML as ro object tree, ns-aware.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module name reflects similarity to well known XML::Simple. The
    uniqueness of it is simplicity, namespace awareness, possibility of
    element serializing without any lose of original informations and
    unambiguous mapping of parsed XML document into Perl structure,
    without assumptions of structure of parsed document.
